title: Gillian Anderson | GOP Stonewalls Biden's Agenda; Rudy Giuliani Sued for Election Lies: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans signaling their intent to stonewall President Biden’s agenda and dismissing the need for an impeachment trial for former President Trump.

Then, Gillian Anderson talks about playing Margaret Thatcher on The Crown and banning her sons from following her on Instagram. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
